item.description:

Specifications

 

 

  • Camera Effective Pixels: 10.1 Megapixels
  • Sensor Size / Total Pixels / Filter: 1/1.7-inch High Sensitivity MOS sensor / 12.8 Total Megapixels / Primary Color Filter
  • Aperture: F1.4 - 2.3 / Multistage Iris Diaphragm (F1.4 - 8.0 (W), F2.3 - 8.0 (T)) / ND Filter (3 steps)
  • Optical Zoom: 3.8x
  • Focal Length: f = 4.7 - 17.7 mm (24 - 90 mm in 35 mm equiv.)
  • Extra Optical: Zoom (EZ) 4.5x (4:3 / 7M), 5.4x (4:3 / 5M), 6.7x (4:3 / under 3M)
  • Intelligent Zoom 7.5x
  • Lens: LEICA DC VARIO-SUMMILUX, 11 elements in 10 groups
  • Optical Image Stabilizer: POWER O.I.S. (On / Off)
  • Digital Zoom: Max. 4x (When Digital Zoom is used simultaneously with Intelligent Zoom, you can only increase the zoom ratio up to 2x.)
  • Focusing Area: Normal: Wide 50 cm - infinity, AF Macro / MF / Intelligent Auto / Motion Picture: Wide 1 cm - infinity / Tele 30 cm - infinity
  • AF Metering: Face / AF Tracking / 23-area / 1-area (flexible / scalable)
  • Viewfinder: Optional: DMW-LVF2
  • ISO Sensitivity: Auto / i.ISO / 80 / 100 / 200 / 400 / 800 / 1600 / 3200 / 6400 / 12800*
  • (Changeable to 1/3 EV step)
  • Photo Style: Standard, Vivid, Natural, Monochrome, Scenery, Portrait, Custom
  • Self Timer: 2 sec / 10 sec / 10 sec (3 images)
  • LCD: 3.0" (7.5 cm) TFT Screen LCD Display (920K dots), AR Coating
  • Field of View: Approx. 100%, Wide Viewing-angle, Auto Power LCD Mode, Power LCD Mode
  • Recording Media: Built-in Memory, SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
  • Built-in Memory: Approx. 70 MB
  • Power: Li-ion Battery Pack (3.6V, Minimum: 1,250 mAh) (Included)
  • Battery Lif: (Approx.) 330 pictures (CIPA Standard)
  • Dimensions (W x H x D): (Approx.) 110.5 x 67.1 x 45.6 mm
  • Weight (Approx.): 269 g without Battery and SD Memory Card

 

Package
